header_text: You walk into a friend's birthday party after traveling in from out of town. An unfamiliar woman approaches you, and you become nervous she will notice your HD symptoms. The woman introduces herself and asks about your trip.

elements.Text: Do your symptoms stop you from engaging in conversation with new people?

elements.name: You walk into a friend's birthday party after traveling in from out of town. An unfamiliar woman approaches you, and you become nervous she will notice your HD symptoms. The woman introduces herself and asks about your trip._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
